com.se_project.controllers

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.se_project.controllers.GameController

  • @Controller
public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the controller functions that link between the game model and its views.

      • CreateMCQGameForm

        @RequestMapping(value="/{teacher_id}/Course/{cid}/createMCQGame",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String CreateMCQGameForm(org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                          @ModelAttribute(value="mcqGame")
                                                                                                                                          com.se_project.models.MCQGame mcqGame,
                                                                                                                                          @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                          java.lang.String teacher_id,
                                                                                                                                          @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                          long cid)
        Parameters:
        mcqGame - object holds the data of the game which will be created
        teacher_id - identifies the teacher through the system
        cid - identify the course through the system
        Returns:
        HTML page contains the form of creating a game

      • CreateTFGameForm

      • CreateMCQGame

        @RequestMapping(value="/{teacher_id}/Course/{cid}/createMCQGame",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String CreateMCQGame(@ModelAttribute(value="mcqGame")
                                                                                                                                       com.se_project.models.MCQGame mcqGame,
                                                                                                                                       org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult,
                                                                                                                                       org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                                       @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String teacher_id,
                                                                                                                                       @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                       long cid,
                                                                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="imagefile")
                                                                                                                                       org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile imagefile)
        Parameters:
        mcqGame - object of the "multiple choice questions" game which will be created
        teacher_id - identifies a teacher through the system
        cid - identifies a course through the system
        imagefile - path of the course image added by a teacher
        Returns:
        HTML page of the teacher's course page updated with the new game or returns HTML page of the create "MCQ" game if the data entered is wrong

      • getGame

        @RequestMapping(value="/{user_id}/Course/{cid}/Game/{gameName}",
                method=GET)
public java.lang.String getGame(@ModelAttribute(value="answers")
                                                                                                                               com.se_project.models.Answers user_answers,
                                                                                                                               org.springframework.ui.Model model,
                                                                                                                               @PathVariable
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                                               @PathVariable
                                                                                                                               long cid,
                                                                                                                               @PathVariable
                                                                                                                               java.lang.String gameName)
        this function checks if the requested game is "true or false" game or "Multiple choice questions" game
        Parameters:
        user_answers - object of the user answers to the questions of a specific game
        user_id - identifies the user through the system
        cid - identifies the course through the system
        gid - identifies the game through the system
        Returns:
        HTML page of "true or false" game or HTML page of " Multiple choice questions" game (depends on the type of the game)

      • submitAnswers

        @RequestMapping(value="/{user_id}/Course/{cid}/Game/{gameName}",
                method=POST)
public java.lang.String submitAnswers(@ModelAttribute(value="answers")
                                                                                                                                      com.se_project.models.Answers user_answers,

                                                                                                                                      @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String user_id,
                                                                                                                                      @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                      long cid,
                                                                                                                                      @PathVariable
                                                                                                                                      java.lang.String gameName)
        this function takes the user answers for a game questions and checks if it is right or wrong
        Parameters:
        user_answers - object of the user answers to the questions of a specific game
        user_id - identifies the user through the system
        cid - identifies the course through the system
        gid - identifies the game through the system
        Returns:
        HTML page of the game result

      • deleteGame

        @RequestMapping(value="/{teacher_id}/Course/{cid}/DeleteGame/{gameName}")
public java.lang.String deleteGame(@PathVariable
                                                                                                              java.lang.String teacher_id,
                                                                                                              @PathVariable
                                                                                                              long cid,
                                                                                                              @PathVariable
                                                                                                              java.lang.String gameName)
        this function delete a specific game from a specific course
        Parameters:
        user_id - identifies the user through the system
        cid - identifies the course through the system
        gameName - identifies the game in the course
        Returns:
        HTML page of a teacher courses page that show all his courses
